#summary Get started with webdo

= Getting started with `webdo` =

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

== 1. Install Ruby ==

  * `webdo` requires [http://www.ruby-lang.org/en/downloads/ Ruby]

== 2. Create a project directory ==

  * Create a new directory where your test files will live.  For example, `webtests`

== 3. Download `webdo` ==

  * Download the [http://code.google.com/p/stretchr/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Ftest%2Fruby%2Fwebdo%2Fwebdo webdo] folder into your project folder

== 4. Create a folder for your tests ==

  * Create a new folder alongside the `webdo` folder called `tests`
 
== 5. Make your `run` script ==

  * Either download the [http://code.google.com/p/stretchr/source/browse/trunk/test/ruby/webdo/samples/run.rb run.rb] file into your `tests` folder,
  * or make a new file called `run.rb` and add the following code to it:

{{{
require "../webdo/webdo"
}}}

== 6. Add tests to your project ==
